rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Knight Progenitor [/i]– Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Knight spells you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast.
[i]Together We Ride![/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, look at the top card of your library. If it is a creature card, you may reveal it and put it onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste and must attack a player this turn.
[i]Veteran[/i] – Whenever exactly two creatures you control attack a player, put a +1/+1 counter on either creature, and put a shield counter on either creature.
